text: Caratacus was a leader of Britain in 1st century AD. He was born in the tribe of Catuvellauni. He resisted the Romans. Dio Cassius called Caratacus the son of the Catuvellaunian king Cunobelin.Dio Cassius, trans Earnest Cary, Roman History 60:19â€“22 ==References== Category:10 births
title: Caratacus
